title: How to Understand the Bottom Area of Any Yelp Page

steps.headline: Open your web browser and visit the Yelp webpage.
Press Ctrl+⇲ End on your keyboard to scroll down to the very bottom of the webpage quickly.
Understand that each Yelp page has an area where a plethora of links that most people want to more-quickly view, can be found.
steps.description: A link to the Contact Us page is there, a link to the Yelp blog, About Yelp, and the Terms of Service and even the Privacy Policy, along with an FAQ page and a lot of other pages exist there. Also included is an area for job opportunities and the like.

steps.headline: Understand that to the right of those few columns, also exists a listing of all the pages where which Yelp also does business in.
Understand that the Content Guidelines link can also be found inside these bottom links.
Realize that The Weekly Yelp, Yelp's weekly newspaper can also be found inside these major bottom of the page.
Realize that in the last column to the bottom right corner is a link to a drop-down that will help you indicate which language you want to view each Yelp page in.
Understand that below all that, exists the copyright information.

text: Open your web browser and visit the Yelp webpage.  Press Ctrl+⇲ End on your keyboard to scroll down to the very bottom of the webpage quickly.  Understand that each Yelp page has an area where a plethora of links that most people want to more-quickly view, can be found. A link to the Contact Us page is there, a link to the Yelp blog, About Yelp, and the Terms of Service and even the Privacy Policy, along with an FAQ page and a lot of other pages exist there. Also included is an area for job opportunities and the like. Understand that to the right of those few columns, also exists a listing of all the pages where which Yelp also does business in.  Understand that the Content Guidelines link can also be found inside these bottom links.  Realize that The Weekly Yelp, Yelp's weekly newspaper can also be found inside these major bottom of the page.  Realize that in the last column to the bottom right corner is a link to a drop-down that will help you indicate which language you want to view each Yelp page in.  Understand that below all that, exists the copyright information.
sentences: Open your web browser and visit the Yelp webpage.
Press Ctrl+⇲ End on your keyboard to scroll down to the very bottom of the webpage quickly.
Understand that each Yelp page has an area where a plethora of links that most people want to more-quickly view, can be found.
A link to the Contact Us page is there, a link to the Yelp blog, About Yelp, and the Terms of Service and even the Privacy Policy, along with an FAQ page and a lot of other pages exist there.
Also included is an area for job opportunities and the like.
Understand that to the right of those few columns, also exists a listing of all the pages where which Yelp also does business in.
Understand that the Content Guidelines link can also be found inside these bottom links.
Realize that The Weekly Yelp, Yelp's weekly newspaper can also be found inside these major bottom of the page.
Realize that in the last column to the bottom right corner is a link to a drop-down that will help you indicate which language you want to view each Yelp page in.
Understand that below all that, exists the copyright information.
